name: It's a Dog's Love
summary: You expect your new job at Heaven, a famous pet store in Tokyo, will be pretty straightforward -- until you discover your handsome co-workers are actually half-dogs with the ability to transform at will! Dobe, Shephe, and Bernar entrust their secret to you, and you soon find family in the pack at Heaven… but not all is peaceful. When a rival pet shop sends thugs to destroy the store, you’re forced to stand your ground and defend your new home alongside your friends.
